attributes.action: urge the council for more designated in closed dog parks in bedfordshire
attributes.additional_details:
are you sick of people telling you to put your dog on a lead when in a public field or public park.. then please calling on all dog owners to help urge the council to build designated in closed dog parks.

dogs need a good run off lead and also helps the public who don't like dogs or are scared of dogs, it also helps dogs get the critical socialisation that they need with other dogs and humans

rejection.details: This is a matter for your local authority rather than central government; you may wish to contact your local authority to find out what can be done in your area.
